name: Immersive View
description: Button to hide uneccesary information, providing an immersive experience.

name: Pixelated Images
description: Convert images into a pseudo pixel art.

name: No Controls
description: Remove the minimum, maximum, and close buttons from the titlebar (Spotify >= 1.2.32)

name: Playbar Clock
description: Current system time on the playbar, with display options.

name: Quick Queue
description: Adds a button to the tracklist to add/remove a song from the queue.

name: Scannables
description: View a scannable code for any track or playlist (like mobile).

name: Sleep Timer
description: Pause playback after a certain amount of time (like mobile).

name: Tracks To Edges
description: Quickly move multiple tracks to the top/bottom (edges) of a playlist.

name: Volume Percentage
description: View/Modify volume percentage in a hoverable Tippy.
